Title: Friendly Improved Mutations
Description:
Just removes a few things from the mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1207623704]Improved Mutations[/url] by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Eboreg2/myworkshopfiles/?appid=333640&p=1]Eboreg[/url] so that it will play nice with other popular mutation mods, cleans up some of the old leftover assembly language in the files, and fixes a bug here and there.

[b]Removed:[/b]
Burrowing Claws, Flaming Ray/Freezing Ray, Poisonous Fangs, Scales, Snake Tail (and Constricted), and Thick Fur.

[b]Tested with:[/b]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2198787801]WM Expanded Mutations (Stable Edition)[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3418224643]Gigantism Plus[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3415333397]Friendly Graven's Mutation Mod[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3114272414]Miscellaneous Mutations[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3400087527]Poison/Paralysis/Confusing Fangs Mutations[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1727376332]Underdark Mutation & Cave Dweller Pack[/url]

Do not use with the original unless you like crashes. All credit goes to the original mod author of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1207623704]Improved Mutations[/url].

If you'd like to contribute to any of my [url=https://github.com/hyd-n-plyn-syt?tab=repositories]public mods[/url], or [url=ko-fi.com/hydnplynsyt]buy me a coffee[/url], feel free!
